posts.post_content: The Human-destroying is gravy. Getting all your dead stuff back is what matters. Also, there's a reason why [Grimgrin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grimgrin) is there behind it. If you use this with Grimgrin in your graveyard, you can easily sac one of your zombies to untap him.

posts.post_content:
I tested my new U/B zombie deck yesterday in a multiplayer game. Too many sorceries and too little creatures, and I had to cast this to keep myself alive. So I raised only one [Butcher Ghoul](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Butcher Ghoul), and there were no humans in play at all. That was probably the lamest Zombie "Apocalypse" ever anywhere.  
  
I still won with that one ghoul though.
